name: Boy (srgovindan)
description:
A narrative game made using the Pix64 Fantasy Console for the Fantasy Console Game Jam #2 (https://itch.io/jam/fantasy-console-game-jam-2).

Controls:
Movement - Up, Down, Left, Right / WASD
Enter / Return - Start level
Esc - Exit level
R - Restart Level

Thanks to ZappedCow for the Pix64 Fantasy Console : )
